general.gigTitle: develop wordpress websites and API integration

sellerCard.oneLiner: Zapier Expert  !  Web Developer ! Automation Expert ! Node js Expert
sellerCard.description:
I am a seasoned developer with 9+ years of experience, specializing in API integration, Zapier automation, WordPress, Nodejs, and AWS. I have extensive expertise in PHP frameworks like CodeIgniter and Laravel, as well as e-commerce platforms such as OpenCart, Shopify, and Zoho CRM.

Proficient in RESTful APIs and OAuth connections, I have integrated numerous APIs across various platforms and services. My skills in Zapier automation streamline workflows and enhance productivity, while my AWS expertise enables me to build and maintain robust, scalable backend solutions.

description.content:
Welcome to our WordPress API integration service tailored for the software industry.


**Description:**

Integrate your website seamlessly with third-party software like CRM systems, inventory platforms, or email marketing tools. We specialize in API integration, WordPress plugin customization, theme adaptation, and WordPress Rest API development.


**Core Services (Default Package):**

- Connect form submissions to CRM systems (One Form and One API)

- OR Integrate with one API endpoint


**Additional Services (Discuss Your Requirements):**

- WordPress design

- Bug fixes

- API integrations

- Plugin and theme customization

- CRM and inventory integrations with WooCommerce


**Expertise Across Platforms:**

- WooCommerce

- CRM (Salesforce, ActiveCampaign)

- Mobile APIs

- eBay, Google Sheets, Google Drive

- Inventory providers


**Note:**

For custom requests or inquiries about additional services, please message us before ordering. We're here to tailor solutions to your needs.

reviews.comment: Kishor provided outstanding work, showcasing professionalism, meticulous attention to detail, and remarkable coding skills. We've worked with Kishor on several projects and iterations; his proactive communication and teamwork always made the collaboration effortless. I highly recommend him for any website development requirements!
Great to work with and will continue to work Kishor in the future. Highly recommended.
Very good communication on part 1 of a larger project. Thank you.

consultationData.description: Zapier Workflows, API Integration and CRM Automation: Streamline your business with expert Zapier workflows API integration and CRM automation for enhanced efficiency and improved customer interaction
